channel.title: Fftrees on Health & Data Science
channel.description: Recent content in Fftrees on Health & Data Science

item.title: Fast and Frugal Trees for decision making in medicine
item.description:
As medcial doctors, we rely on making fast and good descisions about patient care.

The descision tree can be created and explored through the FFTrees package (available on CRAN) created by Dr. Nathaniel D. Philips. The package was demonstrated at a UseR! 2017 (presentation.
